title: Lontor
author: Lontor
content: I want to buy graphic cards but they are v2 of 3060s LHR, I want to know if the newest LHR unlock works on this 3060 V2 to avoid buying the wrong thing.

comments.author: alucard20724
comments.body: Quote from: Lontor on May 07, 2022, 08:53:45 PMI want to buy graphic cards but they are v2 of 3060s LHR, I want to know if the newest LHR unlock works on this 3060 V2 to avoid buying the wrong thing.have you been hiding under a rock all morning?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5397678.0

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: Yes. Just don't buy RTX 3080 12GB's or the RTX 3050, because they are LHRv3.

comments.author: ANSEL_2.0
comments.body: No comment, @Coinfarm ventures said it all right, it looks like Nicehash have cloned the original Excavator miner to their own because the real Excavator doesn't have this LHR unlock yet, even if an hacker have sold the LHR unlock to Nicehash it's should work with many other miners as well but instead they tend to keep it to themselves.

comments.author: GEMIN_M4
comments.body: That's why it's worrisome to me, many LHR farms will move to Nicehash from now on and profits have dropped since the LHR unlock new came out, Nicehash will have control over high Ethereum hash power which is dangerous, imagine an attack on the network takes place.

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: NBMiner has 100% unlock today.  So expect all the majors will have it in short order.

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: Quote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 02:20:48 PMNBMiner has 100% unlock today.  So expect all the majors will have it in short order.You are joking right? Next time just drop a link or a picture to at least proof that what you are saying is the truth, are you currently using Nbminer? If yes send us a screenshot with your LHR graphic cards mining ETH with full hashrate unlocked.

comments.author: Pendrak
comments.created_time: May 08, 2022, 02:57:06 PMLast edit: May 08, 2022, 03:43:46 PM by Pendrak
comments.body: Quote from: BitKongy on May 08, 2022, 02:48:44 PMQuote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 02:20:48 PMNBMiner has 100% unlock today.  So expect all the majors will have it in short order.You are joking right? Next time just drop a link or a picture to at least proof that what you are saying is the truth, are you currently using Nbminer? If yes send us a screenshot with your LHR graphic cards mining ETH with full hashrate unlocked.Here take your video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jSLzSoZQDjwFunny my 3090 gigabyte can't do more than 105 mhs but all my 3080 ti do 117 mhs (my target is 88-90C on memory), my 3080s are doing 97 mhs (before was 77) same consumption same overclock.

comments.author: FirmWars
comments.body: Quote from: Pendrak on May 08, 2022, 02:57:06 PMQuote from: BitKongy on May 08, 2022, 02:48:44 PMQuote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 02:20:48 PMNBMiner has 100% unlock today.  So expect all the majors will have it in short order.You are joking right? Next time just drop a link or a picture to at least proof that what you are saying is the truth, are you currently using Nbminer? If yes send us a screenshot with your LHR graphic cards mining ETH with full hashrate unlocked.Here take your video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jSLzSoZQDjwFunny my 3090 gigabyte can't do more than 105 mhs but all my 3080 ti do 117 mhs (my target is 88-90C on memory), my 3080s are doing 97 mhs (before was 77) same consumption same overclock.About to try this out on my 3070ti rig but I need to upgrade driver to version 510.60.02 for Nbminer to work perfectly in HiveOS, also I need to update the Nbminer to the latest version, I hope I get a good result like everyone else.

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: Quote from: BitKongy on May 08, 2022, 02:48:44 PMQuote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 02:20:48 PMNBMiner has 100% unlock today.  So expect all the majors will have it in short order.You are joking right? Next time just drop a link or a picture to at least proof that what you are saying is the truth, are you currently using Nbminer? If yes send us a screenshot with your LHR graphic cards mining ETH with full hashrate unlocked.Not joking.  Go see for yourself or dont.  Doesnt matter to me…all my LHR are enjoying the boost. And you can read it for yourslf in the NBMiner thread on this which is literaly the post below this one currently.

comments.author: MidNite36
comments.body: Quote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 05:19:08 PMQuote from: BitKongy on May 08, 2022, 02:48:44 PMQuote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 02:20:48 PMNBMiner has 100% unlock today.  So expect all the majors will have it in short order.You are joking right? Next time just drop a link or a picture to at least proof that what you are saying is the truth, are you currently using Nbminer? If yes send us a screenshot with your LHR graphic cards mining ETH with full hashrate unlocked.Not joking.  Go see for yourself or dont.  Doesnt matter to me…all my LHR are enjoying the boost. And you can read it for yourslf in the NBMiner thread on this which is literaly the post below this one currently.Yes its working, tested and confirmed, I am sure that Nicehash isn't behind this unlocking, I am suspecting Nvidia itself, this morning Nicehash release the news and its not even 24hours yet now Nbminer released LHR unlock, something they don't even bother about right from when LHR became a thing.

comments.author: Lontor
comments.body: Thanks for your replies, the order is in route, seller want to add extra money because of LHR is unlocked I talked him out of it.

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: Quote from: MidNite36 on May 08, 2022, 05:34:18 PMQuote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 05:19:08 PMQuote from: BitKongy on May 08, 2022, 02:48:44 PMQuote from: miner29 on May 08, 2022, 02:20:48 PMNBMiner has 100% unlock today.  So expect all the majors will have it in short order.You are joking right? Next time just drop a link or a picture to at least proof that what you are saying is the truth, are you currently using Nbminer? If yes send us a screenshot with your LHR graphic cards mining ETH with full hashrate unlocked.Not joking.  Go see for yourself or dont.  Doesnt matter to me…all my LHR are enjoying the boost. And you can read it for yourslf in the NBMiner thread on this which is literaly the post below this one currently.Yes its working, tested and confirmed, I am sure that Nicehash isn't behind this unlocking, I am suspecting Nvidia itself, this morning Nicehash release the news and its not even 24hours yet now Nbminer released LHR unlock, something they don't even bother about right from when LHR became a thing.probably nvidia last milking of GPUs before the bear market hits hard. Bitcoin ASICs were sold before bear market in the past, nvidia have adopted the strategy.

comments.author: alucard20724
comments.body: Quote from: rchris494 on May 08, 2022, 07:54:57 PM100% lhr unlock & and OC with nicehash quick miner using excavator. nice to see my 3060 lhr running at 46mh instead of the 28mh it use to be.or you could read the posts above you and see that nbminer has the unlocker on any pool and now you aren't tied to nicehack.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.body: Quote from: rchris494 on May 08, 2022, 07:54:57 PM100% lhr unlock & and OC with nicehash quick miner using excavator. nice to see my 3060 lhr running at 46mh instead of the 28mh it use to be.You aren't getting the OC right friend, your RTX 3060 should be doing 50MH, try different clock settings, my 3070ti gets 78MH out of the box until I changed core clock to 900mhz and memory clock to 2600mhz and use a 189watt power limit, this bad boy is now giving me 81MH with Nbminer.

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.created_time: May 09, 2022, 03:45:05 PMLast edit: May 09, 2022, 03:56:09 PM by Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: Quote from: 5W-KILO on May 09, 2022, 10:11:33 AMYou aren't getting the OC right friend, your RTX 3060 should be doing 50MHI have a rig of ten RTX 3060's. 50 Mh is unrealistic except for the top 1% of golden samples. Most of my cards are only stable at a +1000 Mhz memory clock, which comes out to 46-47 Mh.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Quote from: Coinfarm ventures on May 09, 2022, 03:45:05 PMQuote from: 5W-KILO on May 09, 2022, 10:11:33 AMYou aren't getting the OC right friend, your RTX 3060 should be doing 50MHI have a rig of ten RTX 3060's. 50 Mh is unrealistic except for the top 1% of golden samples. Most of my cards are only stable at a +1000 Mhz memory clock, which comes out to 46-47 Mh.Ha, what type of 3060s you have because I am getting 49-50MH on mine, here is my settings On windows OSMiner type: NBminer 41.0 nvidia driver 512.59GPU: inno3D RTX 3060 Twin X2 OC LHR:cclock: @1552 // mclock: +1300Hashrate: 49.00 +- 0.5 // Eff: 429.9 kcclock @1552 // mclock: +1500Hashrate: 50.10 +- 0.5 // Eff: 428.2 k

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on May 09, 2022, 04:01:02 PMMiner type: NBminer 41.0 nvidia driver 512.59GPU: inno3D RTX 3060 Twin X2 OC LHR:cclock: @1552 // mclock: +1300Hashrate: 49.00 +- 0.5 // Eff: 429.9 kcclock @1552 // mclock: +1500Hashrate: 50.10 +- 0.5 // Eff: 428.2 kI have the MSI Ventus 3x RTX 3060 12GB model. The highest stable memory clock is +2200 MHz on Linux (+1100 Windows). I use MinerstatOS with T-Rex. The memory clock is why I'm limited to 46 Mh. One or two of them can probably get the same hashrate as you, but I need to make sure the entire rig is stable.

comments.author: Maliceprime
comments.body: Quote from: Coinfarm ventures on May 09, 2022, 05:18:48 PMQuote from: Outhue on May 09, 2022, 04:01:02 PMMiner type: NBminer 41.0 nvidia driver 512.59GPU: inno3D RTX 3060 Twin X2 OC LHR:cclock: @1552 // mclock: +1300Hashrate: 49.00 +- 0.5 // Eff: 429.9 kcclock @1552 // mclock: +1500Hashrate: 50.10 +- 0.5 // Eff: 428.2 kI have the MSI Ventus 3x RTX 3060 12GB model. The highest stable memory clock is +2200 MHz on Linux (+1100 Windows). I use MinerstatOS with T-Rex. The memory clock is why I'm limited to 46 Mh. One or two of them can probably get the same hashrate as you, but I need to make sure the entire rig is stable.You are right, some people got the same hashrate from MSI Ventus 3060 models, the extra 4 MH is nothing unless you have up to 10 different MSI Ventus models, at this 46MH its not so bad at all.

comments.author: alucard20724
comments.body: nbminer has test version 41.4 that works for 3080 12GB. (in discord channel)I'm getting 106mhash @ 320 watts for my evga 3080 gb with drivers 511.79 windows 11.  +1000 mem oc.  i haven't tweaked yet for efficiency.
